name: Al Haqq
description: Al Haqq, meaning 'The Absolute Truth,' is one of the names of Allah in Islam. It signifies the nature of Allah as the ultimate truth and reality, contrasting with falsehood and impermanence.
summary: The name Al Haqq highlights Allah's role as the source of all true knowledge and the ultimate arbiter of justice. It emphasizes that all matters will return to Him and that He is the foundation upon which truth and justice are built.
